attributes.action: Enact a law to put proposed new Laws with enough support to the Public as Referendums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If enough electorate signitories can be obtained for a new law or legislation, regardless of where it originates, then it should be put to the public vote within 12 months as a referendum and if more than 50% vote yes then it should be passed as a new Bill automatically by Parliment.  The number of signitories could be between 5% and 10% of the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
